name: Trump's Spooky Maze
description:
For Trump's sake, play this game now. It's an experience you won't have in any  other game. Probably the most republican game ever out.

Collect the seven tacos to unlock a secret sexy cutscene!

Yeah, pathfinding is just a little bit broken. But I don't care, if you complain about that, just go back play your overhyped AAA games.
